official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to increase the dollar limitation on the de minimis safe
			 harbor from treatment as a capital expenditure for taxpayers without
			 applicable financial statements.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Increase in dollar limitation on de minimis safe harbor from treatment as capital expenditures for
			 taxpayers without applicable financial statements

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(or the Secretary’s designee) shall modify Treasury Regulation section
			 1.263(a)–1(f)(1)(ii)(D) to increase the $500 limitation contained therein
			 with respect to the de minimis safe harbor for taxpayers without
			 applicable financial statements to $1,000.

text.#text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

The revised regulations under this section shall apply to amounts paid or incurred in taxable years
			 beginning after December 31, 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4332 IH: To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to increase the dollar limitation on the de minimis safe harbor from treatment as a capital expenditure for taxpayers without applicable financial statements.
